sourcesContent:
<template>
<form @sumbit.prevent="onSumbit">
    <input type="text" v-model="title">
<button type="submit">Create</button>
</form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            title: ''
        }
    },
    methods: {
        onsubmit() {
            
            if (this.title.trim()){
                const newTodo = {
                    id: Dat.now (),
                    title:this.title,
                    completed:false

                }
                this.$emit('add-todo', newTodo)
            }

        }
    }
}
</script>
<style>
form {
    display: flex;
}
input {
    width: 400px;
}
</style>
